name: curl_getinfo
purpose: Get information regarding a specific transfer

return.description:
If opt is given, returns its value as a string.
   Otherwise, returns an associative array with the following elements 
   (which correspond to opt):
   
    
     
      "url"
     
    
    
     
      "content_type"
     
    
    
     
      "http_code"
     
    
    
     
      "header_size"
     
    
    
     
      "request_size"
     
    
    
     
      "filetime"
     
    
    
     
      "ssl_verify_result"
     
    
    
     
      "redirect_count"
     
    
    
     
      "total_time"
     
    
    
     
      "namelookup_time"
     
    
    
     
      "connect_time"
     
    
    
     
      "pretransfer_time"
     
    
    
     
      "size_upload"
     
    
    
     
      "size_download"
     
    
    
     
      "speed_download"
     
    
    
     
      "speed_upload"
     
    
    
     
      "download_content_length"
     
    
    
     
      "upload_content_length"
     
    
    
     
      "starttransfer_time"
     
    
    
     
      "redirect_time"
